immediate_surroundings.description: The luxurious top floor of the Arasaka tower. The view of the city is breathtaking.

last_5_actions.result:
You take the broken_pipe.

[EVENT]: As you lift the pipe, you notice a discarded credit-chip underneath.

You move north to the Main Street.

The street is filled with people in trench coats and cybernetic enhancements. Hover-cars zip by overhead.

[EVENT]: A cyber-rat with glowing red eyes lunges at you from a trash can!

Main Street
The street is filled with people in trench coats and cybernetic enhancements. Hover-cars zip by overhead.

Exits: south, up

You move up to the High-Rise Penthouse.

The luxurious top floor of the Arasaka tower. The view of the city is breathtaking.
